content.icerik: Developed against age spots, dark pigmentation marks and uneven skin tones; as result of sun, pregnancy and aging. Multifruitacids in its content stimulates the cell renewal. Synerlight and Gatuline-white have a skin lightening effect and kiminish tone differences on the skin. Vitamin C and Vitamin E-asetat protect the skin from environmental damages. Skin looks illuminated, smoother and younger. INNO-fade cream includes, in addition, Coenzyme Q-10 and UVA + UVB filters.
